data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent:
There is an argument happening between newspapers and Internet sites like Facebook and
Google. The ____ say ____ too ____ money ____ advertisements ____ now ____ to ____ sites. This ____ money ____ from ____ that ____ report ____ news. As a result, they cannot afford to keep doing good reporting.
data.partBlankContent:
There is an argument happening between newspapers and Internet sites like Facebook and
Google. The newsp_____ say th__ too mu__ money fr__ advertisements i_ now go___ to th___ sites. This ta___ money aw__ from comp_____ that actu____ report t__ news. As a result, they cannot afford to keep doing good reporting.
data.answer: 报纸和像Facebook和谷歌这样的网站之间发生了一场争论。报纸上说现在有太多的广告收入流向了那些网站。这就从实际报道新闻的报告中分走了钱。因此，他们无法继续保持良好的报道。
